testsuite.name: Given arrays of revisions When searching start and end values for a field

testcase.classname: Given arrays of revisions When searching start and end values for a field
testcase.name: should find the revisions that entered two states

testcase.classname: Given arrays of revisions When searching start and end values for a field
testcase.name: should return empty array if only the start state is found

testcase.classname: Given arrays of revisions When searching start and end values for a field
testcase.name: should return empty array if only the end state is found

testcase.classname: Given arrays of revisions When searching start and end values for a field
testcase.name: should return empty array if neither state is found

testcase.classname: Given arrays of revisions When searching start and end values for a field
testcase.name: should return very first start state and very last end state if it enters those states multiple times

testcase.classname: Given arrays of revisions When searching start and end values for a field
testcase.name: should return very first start state and very last end state if it enters the end state multiple times

testcase.classname: Given arrays of revisions When searching start and end values for a field
testcase.name: should assume the creation state is the initial one if provided in the time frame

testcase.classname: Given arrays of revisions When searching start and end values for a field
testcase.name: should find the revisions that crossed two states if first state skipped and ordered array of valid states provided

testcase.classname: Given arrays of revisions When searching start and end values for a field
testcase.name: should find the revisions that crossed two states if second state skipped and ordered array of valid states provided

testcase.classname: Given arrays of revisions When searching start and end values for a field
testcase.name: should not find the revisions that crossed two states if first state skipped directly to second state and ordered array of valid states provided
